ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Training in Kunark
ygData.msgSnippet: you are correct, I misspoke. Those bards who were in the beta never needed to train :)  I never needed to anyway as I never got to 51 ;)  Still 50 and counting
ygData.messageBody:
you are correct, I misspoke.

Those bards who were in the beta never needed to train :) I never needed to
anyway as I never got to 51 ;) Still 50 and counting on Test (it's not my
primary server I play there when servers are down or whatever.)

As to the players who have trainers there, as I said, I honestly don't know.
Only guess is: Because there were more of them than there are bards (typical
;) but to say there weren't _any_ bards in the beta is foolish. We had a
song vendor and that's all we needed. Parry and Riposte were late additions
and no bards hit high enough levels to get em anyway.

(well there were a couple GM buffed ones but they get automatic skill 100
when they do that so they don't need em either)



----- Original Message -----
From: "Wallace Elliott" <dbe@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 20, 2000 1:22 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Training in Kunark


> Abashi said beta testers were not allowed to
> leave the new continent. Something is amiss.
> Teien Truescale
> 23 Bard Prexus
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: sentto-160851-19913-961511161-dbe=nwark.com@...
> [mailto:sentto-160851-19913-961511161-dbe=nwark.com@...]
> On Behalf Of Kevin L. Crawford
> Sent: Tuesday, June 20, 2000 7:27 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Training in Kunark
>
>
> Umm not true:
>
> There is a Bard Song Vendor in Kunark. There aren't any trainers because
we
> didn't get any skills after 50 (till 53). Those skills that were thrown
in
> were an after thought and the bards in the beta just went to kelethin on
the
> elven boat (or grabbed a gate/port) to train.
>
> There is a high level song vendor in Kunark so there were bards in the
beta
> test of Kunark. By and large we don't have any Kunark specific issues
> (except that of singing steel) and you can hardly expect 500-1000 beta
> testers (I'm not really sure how many of us there were) to catch the
singing
> steel issue in a 5 week timeframe ;)
>
> Lyrnia Jongleur
> Bard of Norrath since Beta 2
>
